description: Change of use of premises from storage (B8 Use Class) to MOT service station (B2 Use Class); and associated external alteration to increase width of opening along front elevation
decision_conditions: The proposed development would detrimentally impact the amenity of neighbouring properties, would have an adverse impact on transport capacity within the area, and the proposed development would not preserve and enhance the character of the Conservation Area.  As such, the development is contrary to the St Mark's Church and Canal Conservation Area Management Plan; policies 7.4, 7A, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); policies 7.4, 7.6, 7.8 and 7.15 of the London Plan (MALP 2016); and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
